The easiest solution to this problem is to switch the Firestick to Sleep mode or switch it off. Apart from that it would have earned a 5 star rating.

Name: Angelsoft
Review Title: This is faster, neater, a much better product all round.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 April 2021
Review Content: So I told myself that I didn’t need a new fire stick, given that I already had an original.Then, in a fit of, I don’t know, Communist controlled insanity? I bought the new one.This is faster, neater, a little harder to navigate until you get a grip, and a much better product all round. So the old one is in a box, as a back up, and the new one is in place.

Name: Penelope Polins
Review Title: A great addition to our collection!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2021
Review Content: As a chronic pain patient, I spend a lot of time upstairs icing or heating my spine every day and it can get rather lonely and monotonous, especially during the working week. Having a Fire Stick means I’m not stuck with daytime TV and can escape wherever I want to as a distraction from the pain. I’d recommend one to anyone who has a TV in their bedroom as well as the living room!

Name: Jazmine Belt
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 March 2021
Review Content: Works brilliantly, all the apps I wanted are available now, including NowTV and Apple TV which were a big part of the reason I decided to buy this. I used the cable that came with the fire stick to plug into the USB on my TV meaning there are no wires hanging out the back to plugs. Amazon sells a shorter cable (around £20 at time of writing) to plus to fire stick into the TV but you don’t need to buy this as the one included is fine. Voice recognition is great, very happy with this.

Name: RICHARD HARRIS
Review Title: One I will be sticking to in future.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 December 2020
Review Content: I bought this as I needed to add an app to my toshiba smart TVs that the tv refused to accept. The fire stick not only solved the problem but I now use it for my Netflix, prime, Disney+ along with all my terrestrial catch up services as I not only find it more responsive but the interface is user friendly and easy to understand. I fully recommend this product as it has made my tv viewing easier and quicker.

Name: Chrome
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 January 2021
Review Content: As I’m on a strict data limit, I needed something which would allow me to lower the video quality on Prime Video thereby reducing the data rate.My Sony TV’s built-in Prime app didn’t let me do this but the Firestick Lite that I got allowed me to do this.It’s important to note however that reducing the data rate on the FireStick ONLY reduces it for Prime Video.Netflix allows you to reduce the data rate through the account profiles that you set up & Youtube lets you do it whilst watching a video.Along with Netflix & YouTube, I now have my three main apps which are all set to lower data rates & as an unexpected bonus the FireStick has recognised my Sony TV remote control & works completely from that.This was unexpected & I only found out by accident when I picked up the tv remote & everything worked from that.Well worth the £29.99 in my view & for anyone without a Smart TV it’s a no-brainer.

Name: Thomas McMaster
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 November 2020
Review Content: everything fits as described but ,its a no show im not pleasds custemor for 13+yrs and havent had much to com-------plian about .bu-tthis has ruined my happiness to say the least ,is therea code i  shoul be entering?+-r

Name: Ms. J. Stark
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 February 2021
Review Content: I upgraded my Fire stick to this and I Love It!!  Voice recognition is my favourite part, so quick & so easy to find what you are looking for. Alexa is as always very helpful and the whole Fire stick is so much better, I don’t have to constantly unplug to reset, it’s quicker to get from app to app - absolutely amazing wished I had realised I could have upgraded much sooner .

Name: Lezley
Review Title: Iis upgraded my older Tv. Perfect.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 December 2020
Review Content: I wanted to up grade our old Tv in dinning room. Didn't wish to fork out for new one, as this one I already have was perfect it just didn't have apps etc. As we only use it week days to eat. Well, it's perfect. Definitely worth the money, and now I have a new Tv on the wall. Easy to install and use this is third I have purchased. Excellent value,to up grade my Tv.💯🎥💯

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 October 2020
Review Content: Important...........after saying that I was disappointed.  BBC iPlayer and ITV hub are now working. Amazon sent an apology. We think may have been teething problems. We are now very happy with it .

Name: John
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 December 2020
Review Content: Lightening fast simplified menu, superb HD quality, strong WiFi receiver much better than the 2nd Gen stick this has replaced. Great upgrade ideal if you don’t need 4K quality. Live TV button on remote nice addition so for UK residents you can download the app TV Player which will provide plenty of free to air channels that sync with the new Live Tv Button on remote.

Name: T
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 December 2020
Review Content: This is great, has turned an old TV into an internet enabled TV. Bit annoying that it needs it's own power source, but other than that easy to setup and works perfectly. Also a little annoying that there's no agreement with Now TV, but such is life, can't have it all.

Name: tp_79
Review Title: Good picture quality. Interface could be better
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2021
Review Content: I don't use Alexa or voice control. The one thing I use it for is a streaming box. It's okay for this, but the main menu is information overload. Wish there was a default where you can just see your apps and nothing more, rather than being bombarded with everything else first.Apart from that, picture quality is good and the box is fast to navigate through.

Name: Carrie anne
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2021
Review Content: We have 3 fire sticks around the house and they are great for the kids (and adults!) Easy to use and easy to set up as your just signing in to accounts like you would via phone or computer.  We also have a couple of Alexas so have combined them to work together. Definitely a gpod buy especially for the price (which at the time of my purchase was down to £24.99)

Name: Joanna
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 December 2020
Review Content: I love my fire stick, best £20 I have spent. Means I can watch the programmes I like in my room, as I don't like what the others in my household watch (shopping TV, reality shows 😕) I can get BT sport too so can watch all the rugby I want. Loads of stuff on Amazon Prime & is good to see YouTube documentaries and old movies on a larger screen. Brilliant value.

Name: Kj
Review Title: Works perfectly easy to set up affordable
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 April 2021
Review Content: Amazon fire stick and the Alexa are my fav absolutely fav items I ownAmazing qualityGreat brandAlways there to helpKindWorks so wellVery very affordable for all families this is fabulousStreams really wellSo very simple to use and set up even I can do it 😊In every way possible I recommend amazon technology

Name: Mae B
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 April 2021
Review Content: I have to confess this has really made me smile since it arrived. I have a JVC smart TV with Freeview and also an Amazon Prime subscription, I wasn't really able to use either very well but the Fire Stick has changed that. It's been great having everything in one place and the Alexa feature is pretty fun and useful. I haven't found it an issue using the TV remote for volume control so this basic model works just fine. The added bonus is that ITV Hub works without the annoying buffering I was getting on Freeview and the general stream quality has been great.

Name: Blues Brother
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 March 2021
Review Content: Incredibly easy to set up. Plug into TV. Plug into power outlet.Easy to follow on screen instructions to locate your Wi - Fi.Click on your chosen Apps and follow more easy instructions with some password set up on your main device  or computer and you're good to go.Took minutes and no need to be tech savvy in any way.Good product thus far.

Name: TB STEWART
Review Title: Excellent bit of kit and easy set up
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 January 2021
Review Content: I bought this to 'convert' my 65" plasma to smart TV. Super easy to set up - I already have an echo show, and the two obviously share information, as I didn't have to go through any set up for wi-fi etc.In my instance, my TV only has one HDMI input (as its predominately a large format monitor), so my sky box etc go via a Harman Kardon surround sound system. To set up the Firestick, I used the supplied HDMI extended cable and plugged this direct into an HDMI input on the surround sound. I set the sound to best available and it would seem the two communicate - the surround sound switches to Dolby (and sounds great) when I start the Firestick up.The set up of Netflix/Prime and the catch up channels, although a laborious task, is pretty straight forward.To sum up, if you have a perfectly good working TV that you want to have the functionality of a smart TV, then this  is the best £29 you'll spend!

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 January 2021
Review Content: Why choose anything other than an Amazon Fire Stick,  it dose everything you ever need for your TV viewing and entertainment.  As lone as you have Internet or WiFi you can watch all sorts of TV platforms.  And play exciting and fun games like THE CHASE,  PACMAN to name a couple.  We have tried others but the format and ease of the AMAZON FIRE STICK  is second to none.

Name: vfrbiker
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 December 2020
Review Content: Initially liked this product as a replacement for Roku which had run its course. Great Alexa integration with basic fwd, rwd and pause commands.  Now, however, after 7 weeks I have to navigate many prime video adverts before I can get to the app I need. Moreover I have to reset device daily by unplugging from mains as it either freezes with no control from remote or plays without volume. Each reset works but I’m getting rather frustrated with the need to do this. Think I’ll go back to Roku

Name: Matt
Review Title: Can't get any other apps to download.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 November 2020
Review Content: Update - I got through to Amazon live chat, I had the wrong country set up, it was showing as Australia and I Live in the UK, once they changed this, All was fixed.I can't seem to get anything to install, I have searched the web and cannot see a solution, it has nothing to do with the 1 click settings or card not being registered, it simply says 'unable to download app', this applies to everything I am trying to download, I tried using the help function built-in but it says it fails to call me.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 December 2020
Review Content: Our 2013 Panasonic TV which cost an awful lot of money had problems with the Apps.  You tube and I player stopped working - was told this was because the contract with them and Panasonic had expired.  After a very simple installation, we now enjoy all that the TV used to offer plus a good deal more.  Much better than buying a new TV!  Quite delighted

Name: Old John
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 March 2021
Review Content: Good piece of kit once I worked out that it needs to be left on (in sleep mode) all the time. Switch off at supply & I had problems with no sound when trying to use it again.There is no off setting on stick.It is a very low wattage appliance & this is the way it is supposed to work. Other than that which is no great hassle I am well pleased with it.

Name: TrevorFarnham
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2021
Review Content: Once you get to using this then it makes a good method for accessing online content e.g BBC iPlayer.  However if I had gripes it would be that the user interface is not that intuitive and probably more importantly it often drops the link to wifi meaning you have to restart the device.  Iam ok doing this but not certain a computer novice would like this.

Name: Sonny
Review Title: Best alternative to costly sky packages
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 March 2021
Review Content: We dont have an outside Ariel so the Fire Stick is a welcomed alternative to paying costly sky packages etc.We can watch almost everything and can live stream the regular channels. We do pay for Netflix and Prime subscriptions but this isn’t really necessary as there’s plenty to watch.Quality is good and the price is awesome for what it does. We have one in every room of the house inc kids bedrooms, you can add parent control too if required. Wouldn’t be without one. Highly recommend

Name: Phil Harrison
Review Title: Bought to replace an old Fire Stick that was working very slowly.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 May 2021
Review Content: Our original Fire Stick has started to work very slowly and, now and then, it would stop working completely. We had to disconnect it and reboot it. Since we use it a lot, it was time to buy a new one which promised to be more powerful and efficient. It has worked! We now do not have any annoying waits for the stick to power up and go to our selected choices.

Name: C. Kewley
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 October 2020
Review Content: I received the Fire Stick a couple of days ago, dead easy to set up. I have only had a short time to play with it but find it a boon. Great for finding cartoons for our 2 year old granddaughter and 60s music for myself. Using the Alexa voice control makes it so much easier too. So far, money well spent.

Name: Kindle Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 December 2020
Review Content: I’m not very good with “techie” stuff so will keep this brief.This new fire stick is twenty times faster than my old one so for that alone I award five stars.I also like the voice control. There are already two Alexa’s in the house so this feature is unused.I’m glad I bought this and it was during a promotion so the price was good.

Name: David Shepherd
Review Title: Regularly loses connection to Wifi Hub
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 May 2021
Review Content: When it is up and working this acts as an perfectly acceptable way to access streaming services on an older TV. A little bit slower to respond than my Samsung Smart TV, but very usable and great value. However the Fire Stick regularly loses contact with my WiFi hub when not being used which leads to me having to frequently intervene to get it working.

Name: Tabbycat
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 December 2020
Review Content: I haven’t activated Alexa yet. It was easy to install but the batteries went after two days. I replaced them. I’ve had a few issues with getting from one channel  to another sometimes. I’ve was  advised to contact Amazon helpline. They were helpful and suggested I turned the tv off once or twice a week from the mains to lengthen battery life v

Name: Kindle Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 May 2021
Review Content: I ordered this as my old one had given up the ghost. I work away from home during the week so I like too watch Netflix .  it is so quick and streams really fast and no buffing .  I could also download more channels like sky and now tv which I had not had before.  The voice recognition is superb.  I have a lot of fire products and I am never disappointed thank you  🙏 A++

Name: fair trade 4 all
Review Title: Firmware not ready to be used with iplayer and stereo echos
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 December 2020
Review Content: although amazon customer service told me to buy this rather then the cube it actually performs really badly.  The sound and reliability when in hometheatre mode is woeful. When playing BBC iplayer it buffered every few minutes and even rebooted itself a couple of times.  I believe the developers are to realease ne software but that is of no use if we want to use it now over christmas. And who is to say their update will work to fix this fault anyway.  seems to me it has been release too early. I think 4th gen echo suffers from that to.

Name: CAMBROB
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 January 2021
Review Content: We.bought the firestick lite as our old tv doesn't have All 4 or Disney plus (we were using son's  old xbox for Disney). Just stuck the stick in back of tv and into the mains. No looking back! Press the button, say what you want to watch and voila...that easy. No more changing HDMI port - it does that itself, no then finding the app needed, straight to the programme. No going back now - much cheaper.than a new TV!

Name: Caz Donovan
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: My grandson bought this for me for my Christmas present.  It's great, I've been able to catch up on missed programmes, and am looking forward to seeing whats films I can watch.  It's great that it's Alexa voice activated, saving time on finding programmes that I want to see.  I've so far only used it for playing music and viewing iplayer, looking forward to finding what else is available.  A great gift.

Name: A L
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 March 2021
Review Content: The firestick is great, had no problems setting it up. My only complaint is the parental settings, you can set it to kids mode, but it's easy to navigate out of that and into the prime store. You can set up a 4 digit pin code, but it would be better if there was a way to hide adult content all together. I've been trying to turn of the 1 click purchase option on amazon prime on my TV. But can't seem to work out how to do it.

Name: Ed Mead
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 March 2021
Review Content: I thought my telly was pretty new, but I've had difficulty receiving britbox and disney. The firestick enables me to watch these services with absolutely no hassle. Plus, my broadband seems a bit stretched watching netflix, all other devices in the house need to be off, but with the hdmi extender this acts as a kind of amplifier, so all in all the firestick is a god send!

Name: JayBee
Review Title: Good option for non smart TV's
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 December 2020
Review Content: This is the 2nd fire stick I have purchased, the first was for my son's non smart tv and this one is for another non smart tv.Great product, well made and does the job really well.It's very easy to set up and works as it should.Very pleased with this product and based on my experience I would recommend.Thank you :O)

Name: sandra
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 November 2020
Review Content: this is my second firestick and bought it for the bedroom.  the alexa is too great. my dog is called lexi and when i call the dog alexa says --sorry dont know that one. i really enjoy my amazon alexa products. i also have the echo so i have the best of amazon making life enjoyable--especially as i am in my 8th month of shielding. for me amazon is a godsend

Name: Chris
Review Title: Great addition and great voice control functionality.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 January 2021
Review Content: I bought the Amazon fire stick for our upstairs tv, it has been a great addition being able to access amazon tv, Disney +, Netflix and many other features via voice control through the remote. Voice searching is fast, convenient and accurate even for my west country accent. Heartedly recommend especially during the discounted price sales.

Name: Belle
Review Title: Works great, easy to use and set up.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2021
Review Content: I am a bit of a technophobe I had an old generation 1 which was struggling to download and stream. I decided to upgrade to the new stick with Alexa which I have avoided as I hate devices 'listening in'. After reading up on this stick I found Alexa you need to press and hold the button for it to 'listen'. Which I love.  My new stick I followed the instructions, logged in alright and off I went! I did have to download BBC iPlayer, more 4 etcetera. Far faster than my old stick. Highly recommend.  My fibre broadband speed is 36 Mb so not the fastest.

Name: Brainwave
Review Title: Easily upgrade your HDTV to a smart TV.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 December 2020
Review Content: Everything you need to turn your TV into a smart TV. All leading video and music Apps available. Not all are loaded up first but you can add others you need later from Apps section. Works fast, good quality. Top tip, If you have a Sony TV it’s remote control can control this including volume, you will just need to use the firestick controller for Alexa.

Name: Simon G. Cole
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 December 2020
Review Content: I bought one of these for football crazy uncle with learning difficulties. I set it up, explained how to work it, left him to it. 24 hrs later had a call to day he keeps getting message that home service not available. Went back, eventually had to restore back to factory settings.  Then another call to say message came up. Went back got it working again and we sat down to watch a programme. 30 mins later we were kicked out and the stick faulted again.  Not happy. Will probably have to send damn thing back for replacement.#ihatetechnology.

Name: F. A. L. Elphick
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2021
Review Content: I find it hard to use. Alexa for me is not an essential tool. I don't like the feeling it overhears my conversations either. I find the whole screen too complicated with loads of 'apps' and pictures of films. Easier to use a straight forward television. I can also use Amazon primes channels through my P C. which is easy to understand.

Name: dash471
Review Title: Works well but has connection issues
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 March 2021
Review Content: Hi managed to get it setup fine and runs ok.However there seems to be a bug in the code somewhere. When your router reboots the fire stick can not reconnect without being powered off and on again. This is even mentioned on the leaflet in the box so it’s a known problem that is not mentioned in the product details. Needs fixing.

Name: CJ
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2021
Review Content: The built in Amazon Prime app on my smart TV had become so so slow that it was frustrating to bother using. So I bought a fire stick to in effect do the same thing. Amazon Prime is so quick running on it, much easier to scroll through. Have the added bonus of loads of other optional apps to install and watch on my TV, particularly handy to fight the boredom during lockdown.

Name: music
Review Title: Will work on old TV good for price prime and pluto YouTube good for films ideal for 2nd room or.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 December 2020
Review Content: For price very good for bedroom. Took time to find WIFI connection but good at the moment.  My WIFI  gets its moments of loosing the connection but it is for extended bedroom and when it works well pleased with firestick ,bought at £18 now back to £30  very happy .Good Apps would be suitable  for main television i have  Prime on Android TV but older TV with full HD would be ideal .If you have a smart 4k go for the 4k firestick and enjoy .

Name: Nessa's mum
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: My 2nd Firestick, I've had one for ages plugged into the TV in my living room but when I saw the offer price of £17.99 I decided to get another one for the bedroom TV that never gets used. Got it set up quickly and easily and tried it out, it was great. Of course I haven't watched a programme on it yet but it's there when I want to.

Name: Gemma W.
Review Title: Makes a normal tv a smart tv for a fraction  of the cost!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2021
Review Content: Bought in sales to replace 1st gen firestick which was coming to the end of its life, it's amazing, my old one although had been well used was getting a bit old and leggy, this one is much faster and no buffering, the voice control makes it much easier searching for specific programs, would have been happy with it paying full price.

Name: Stephen Carroll
Review Title: Does what I need it to.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 December 2020
Review Content: I bought one of these to plug into a monitor rather than a TV to allow us to sort of use it as a smart TV without needing to keep logging on to the PC and make it easier for the kids.It has all the apps I need and the remote is simple but allows you to move through the menus and control what you are watching easily enough.

Name: Kindle Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 December 2020
Review Content: We have two of these now and I bought a third for my parents. This makes watching Disney + on a non smart tv a reality. Before we could only access it on the iPad, even our 5 yr old smart tv couldn’t cope with the updates required for it and Now tv. Having the fire stick means we can watch the latest YouTube on any of our TVs

Name: Nick
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 January 2021
Review Content: Easy to fit and follow instructions to install and Log In. After that, the whole is your oister! The Alexa Voice control is simple, pressing a button rather than operating all the time. Good voice regognition and therefore quick to operate, paricularly for music request. Easy to locate Amazon Prime, YouTube, BBC I-player, etc. So if you don't aleady have it installed in TV set, worth every penny!

Name: Mancgas
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 February 2021
Review Content: We’ve got several Fire Sticks of all ages- all work fine. Freezes, every programme with advertising break goes back to begining of the programme rather than picking up fro where advert cut in. Re started it, wiped and reinstalled done same with affected apps ie All4 - still does same. Spend an extra £5 and get a proper one!

Name: Cindy
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 January 2021
Review Content: Yes the fire stick is a good investment if you don’t want to pay the extortion prices of sky or any other digital box.I do sometimes have issues with Alexa voice recognition but after repeating myself 3 times if she doesn’t get it I ask for something else or turn it off.I’m having trouble with the network connection and hdmi connection. Even with the adaptor the internet drops on it. Even tho the connection to my phone is ok. If I don’t connect it to the hdmi properly before turning it on the sound will not work so have to turn it off and on again.These are common issues with most digital things. Just have to be patient and persevere.Picture quality is good when connected to the internet properly. Most of the time it’s great.

Name: marshman1
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 January 2021
Review Content: This is my third fire stick  but although the picture is good, the menu is not so good as on a smaller tv  you need a magnifing glass to see the icons . I have a fire tv box with 4k ultra and a 2 year old fire stick which works perfect with a good size menu.The new fire stick is ok if you have  a 55 inch screen but in a bedroom with a 26 inch screen its hard to read.Also  the sound does not work  on a tv unless  you change the settings from dolby to stero [pcm].

Name: Richard, Leicester
Review Title: So easy to setup and use
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 December 2020
Review Content: Just plug it in, pop some batteries in the remote. Choose your language. Enter your wifi details. Then it updates and good to go. For the voice control you don't have to preface "Alexa..." you just say what you want whilst pressing the microphone button. Much faster than the original Firestick. Pleased I made the upgrade.

Name: Dilpreet Singh Gill
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2021
Review Content: After using it for a couple of days, I've noticed some issues. When you try to mirror your smartphone or pc with mirroring feature, It says connecting and after a few seconds it suddenly exits the mirroring feature for no reason. Tried to do that using different devices but no success. Apart from that, if it loses the wireless connection with router, it doesn't connect automatically afterwards and asks you to do it manually. Even though you do it manually, it keeps asking to reconnect the device with a wireless connection, that seems to be a bug. Since there is no option to shut down the device on remote, you have to turn off and turn on your tv or simply unplug the firestick power plug so that it can refresh itself to re-establish the connection with WiFi. Pretty disappointed tbh... wondering if roku was a better option.

Name: Mr Michael Bufton
Review Title: Easy to setup, lots of content
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2021
Review Content: I haven't reviewed the voice recognition or Alexa integration as we don't use these controls.We bought the stick so we could access Disney plus and it met those requirements.Really easy to setup.Very impressed with the ease of use and all the additional content that is available.Highly recommended!

Name: Topcat 1001
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2021
Review Content: We have an old firestick which used to take us ages to navigate to where we actually needed to be so i thought whilst this was on offer we'd give a go.So worth it! Much quicker to navigate to programmes,, Iplayer, prime etc and the Alexa voice control is so easy to use.So glad we purchased this, well worth the money.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Title: My second Fire TV stick, doesn't work so well as the first
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 December 2020
Review Content: This device is the second of two that I have, it is used purely as a streaming assistant for the most popular TV prog's, For some reason or another it will not work with Prime , the movie titles are clearly on show but when choosing a Prime movie, the picture starts to stream then the streaming indicator just stays rotating for ever

Name: Luke
Review Title: Be careful what you ask for
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 January 2021
Review Content: Voice recognition is okay but you can inadvertently start watching premium content. You will also need to make sure your kids don’t start ordering stuff. My five year old had signed up to Amazon music without my knowledge, or his. Frustrating that the fire stick seems to disconnect from internet regularly. When working tho it is a good platform for viewing Netflix/prime in one place and very easy to set up.

Name: alandavid
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 December 2020
Review Content: As a subscriber to several media apps , that had become unsupported by Blu-ray, a timely price reduction on the fire stick plus  those apps  being supported by Amazon meant a seamless change over to this system.The technology works well and the picture quality is good, also its worth googling for tips, shortcuts and formatting.

Name: Nosyt
Review Title: Vast improvement over the 1st generation Fire Stick
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 March 2021
Review Content: Been running a first generation Fire Stick for some years now and, of late, it has been terribly slow to use. Menus in particular with many channels just timing out after selection (My5, Channel 4 for example).Factory resets etc etc on the old model failed to make any difference and we concluded that it was our not so fast broadband at fault.However it was suggested that we try the newer model and - instantly - much improved performance. No menu lag, no timeouts and so on.Very pleased.

Name: Kenan Isbilir
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 December 2020
Review Content: easy to set up, works good. the remote is a bit flimsy, as the back cover started to become a little lose, but it is still working ok. Wifi internet connection has dropped twice and it took a bit of time and restarting the device to re-establish it, as it seemed not coming back automatically. Overall, good product for the price.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 December 2020
Review Content: A brilliant product if you have broadband/wi fi, but no TV antenna. I use it in a room where I did not want to install a new antenna cable. The reception is excellent and I can watch live TV, catch up or streaming services. I also use the fire stick in my motorhome and connect via a hot spot on my phone. This allows me to get UK television whilst abroad provided I get a reasonable data signal. The firestick is  great value for money.

Name: Kunle
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 February 2021
Review Content: Very good product. Does exactly what it says. The only drawback I have is the installation and connection process. So many software updates to be done and the sign up process gave me a lot of tough time because the product user Amazon account wouldn't just work with it until I have to sign up a new account for the user. The second drawback is that some application I am expecting are not on the apps store although all that was listed on the product add were available. Overall I will recommend this product for any one who has the patience to go through the installation processes

Name: Robert Hall
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: I have what must be an early smart tv, and I could not get amazon prime on it, which is why I bought this.  Not only can I get Amazon Prime Video, I can also get ITV Hub, channel 4 catch-up and myfive, all of which I could not get before. This is a brilliant thing, and much cheaper than a new TV!  Highly recommended.

Name: Rilk
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 February 2021
Review Content: When channel 5 stopped streaming to my kitchen tv I was disappointed. When channel 4 stopped streaming, I was gutted. I was told about the fire stick and it was the best decision I made to get one. I would have had to buy a new TV to get the channels I was missing but the firestick Is by far the best thing ever! Love it!

Name: Robert James Simpson
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 March 2021
Review Content: Very pleased with my fire TV stick, it has all the apps I want, some of which disappeared from my smart TV, hence me buying this product in the first place. I have  had no problems with streaming, and I particularly like the ability to voice search for a programme or film, with results from all services displayed. Only glitch I have noticed up to now is on the All4 app where of I pause a programme and then restart it, at the next ad break it sometimes goes back to the beginning of the episode! Thus may well be an issue with the app provider though so won't dock a star over it!

Name: Darren C.
Review Title: So much quicker than the old ones!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 January 2021
Review Content: Bought the new gen fire stick to replace an old 1st gen stick that was used in my bedroom. It really is night and day in comparison with speed as this new fire stick absolutely blazes through tasks and it boots to the Home Screen in a fraction of the time compared to the old one. Very happy indeed with the upgrade.

Name: elsie13
Review Title: Saved me money on new tv.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2021
Review Content: I was going to upgrade my tv by buying a new one . My son said my present tv was ok but would be much improved by simply buying a Fire Stick Lite.  I took his advice and was quite sceptical but to my surprise it worked beautifully. It virtually loaded itself  without any fuss and now I have a much better choice of programmes. One happy bunny!

Name: Natalie D.
Review Title: Bought as a I needed a remote control for the old one .
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 December 2020
Review Content: I really like the fire stick but I only bought this as I needed a remote control for my old one replacing.Its about time a replacement remote is made available that doesn't cost as much as the whole firestick package.  And yes I tried the remote on the phone app and it was dreadful, only worked intermittently.

Name: S6D3
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 December 2020
Review Content: The product overall is pretty good. Would’ve given 5 stars but I bought one for me and my mum we both have had the same problems sometimes the screen just goes blank and you have to unplug it to restart it and to make it work again. We have this problem mainly with Netflix when we’re just watching a movie the screen will go blank and restarting it won’t do anything you will have to unplug. But it’s a good product and the Alexa voice control is really helpful and it’s really fast I love the start up sound it makes but if you want to get the best out of your product I would suggest using it on a new TV as my TV is pretty old and makes a certain noise. And I don’t think the issue where it blacks out is with my TV because my mums one does the same thing and her TV is new

Name: Anthony
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 December 2020
Review Content: We had subscribed to a streaming service that one of our TVs didn't support. The fire stick provided the ability to watch the service and many others in one place. The remote is brilliant and the Alexa integration makes finding and searching very easy.I am looking to get another for the TV in our gym.

Name: David of Almondsbury
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 October 2020
Review Content: It's a great product. I already had a Fire Stick and bought this one for the bedroom TV so we could "YouTube" in bed. I'm not sure what the star rating for 'Thickness' means so I gave it 3 stars.  If there is a USB socket on your TV you can power the Fire Stick from that rather than having to use a 13 amp socket.

Name: Wiseowl
Review Title: Almost faultless streaming of Netflix content
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 January 2021
Review Content: This was a replacement for a much older firestick and I don't know why I didn't replace it sooner.  It responds quickly to remote and to voice though I haven't had to use alexa much at all. Signing up to Netflix was easy.  Setup very easy. Almost faultless streaming - no visible buffering at all of HD content so the one incidence I have experienced so far of a nano-second picture distortion may have been caused by an internet issue. So far I have only used it for Netflix so can't comment on any other services

Name: Mahi Rahman
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 November 2020
Review Content: Good budget home entertainment and alternative to standard satellite channels if you watch movies online. If you have amazon prime or an old non  "smart tv" you can make it smart and modern compatible with many devices or use your internet to watch amazing shows and movies on the cheap and in HD. Can't help it but recommend but if you want to do gaming from Android Google Store or have nice OS running on it then you are off better buying alternative brand "Android TV Box" which will fully support android and its features.

Name: TY R GRAIG
Review Title: Ok, So far though a few gliches.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 April 2021
Review Content: I have had the Fire stick Sincerely the beginning of March now, an So for it has performed ok so for though there have been a few disappointments.1: the streaming qualityhas been a bit glich.2: a few times the device has stores, given tge reason for it being a result of internet connection. I performed a few tests at the times and found the internet connection to be performing we'll.I only bought this as a replacement to my original fire stick as it stores working.As a replacement I can not say that this newer and upgraded version is of any improvement on my first one.I am going to monitor before contacting amazon about the issues.

Name: J. Laidler
Review Title: Good but power and volume issues
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 October 2020
Review Content: Simple reasons for 3 stars.1. Why does it not automatically use USB power to power it. I needed a new socket gang to accommodate it. Cable I bought separately from Amazon doesn’t take enough power from the tv2. Disney+ volume. Seems to be a common complaint. Why is the volume so low on this app compared to all others?But still pleased I bought one and the lite version is more than enough for my purposes

Name: L. Best
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2021
Review Content: Wasn't sure if I would get along with it or not, but I do and I love it. I can access so many things on there. Everything from the Internet for my skillshare, YouTube, prime videos, Spotify and Disney plus. Just to name some of my favs. So many things to do. Easy to use. Don't know why I put it off for so long.

Name: oldgit
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2021
Review Content: the set up was quite easy and it loads much faster than my old fire stick my only bug on it is getting the sound to synchronise have tried the adjustment side but so far not quite right so I am trying by moving 1 step at a time to get it right so fingers crossed if not for this problem it would have been 5 star on all

Name: David Martin
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 March 2021
Review Content: All you need to know is that it's simple to install..plug in and play. Once installed choose the Apps you want most require subscription and download, follow the easy to read instructions on screen and off you go. Remote to use microphone to instruct Alexander works well e.g " find me a war romantic comefy" 5 seconds later a great selection is available.

Name: sue
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 November 2020
Review Content: I had been having problems with receiving Netflix etc. and couldn't seem to troubleshoot the cause (as in is it my broadband or firestick)? after three days of it saying no signal on screen I spoke to Amazon customer service and they advised trying a new firestick which I did so problem solved......thankfully.

Name: Julie McCarthy
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 November 2020
Review Content: The fire stick is brilliant brought a small smart tv for my disabled daughter when it came it didn’t have the apps I required the main app Disney+ as I’m Subscribe to it now don’t use the tv apps just the fire stick got everything I need. The Quality of the picture seems better than the TV at picture. Very pleased

Name: maurice
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 January 2021
Review Content: Easy replacement for current original version of Firestick. I noticed how much faster this 'booted up'. Much faster for finding programmes by using 'Alexa' voice commands. Did not have to 'train' her to recognise my voice either. Generally vast improvement, well worth the investment. It's made my t/v smarter than before!

Name: jen60
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 December 2020
Review Content: Had to phone help desk to get it set up, that took over 30 mins, as their computer kept going down.Some programs the picture quality and sound are so bad  you can't watch.I do try and use the voice commands when I know what program to view, otherwise it's a crawl through the programs I can view.

Name: Peter Ditchfield
Review Title: A cheap and easy replacement for my broken aerial
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 March 2021
Review Content: Love the Firestick Lite. I’ve been without a working aerial for my tv for about 3 years relying on my iPad to watch most tv as not all the tv apps allow streaming to my tv using my old Apple TV box but now I can watch all the standard tv channels plus so much more straight on my tv and all for the cost of about £30, less than it would have cost to get someone 4 stories up onto my roof to even look at my aerial. Haven’t really tried to set up the Alexa as not really interested so can’t comment on that.

Name: Selene
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 March 2021
Review Content: Bought to plug into our projector.  Can't complain, the quality is spot on and the alexa voice recognition saves a lot of time! Opted for the lite as I didnt need the additional controls for casual use.  The hdmi adapter is handy as well if you can't fit the stick directly in the port due to limited space.

Name: Mr. M. Randall
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 March 2021
Review Content: Excellent ! Have been wanting one fof a while and its lives up to expectations.Its easy to set upVery easy to useStreaminh is fast and the image clear..i have not had a single moment of buffering or slow loading.Every app works wellBbc, Ch 4, ITV, netflix, prime, disney, uktv

Name: Willow
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: Superb Firestick. I had an older version which had become very slow to respond to any commands. This new Alexa one is brilliant! It’s super quick and I’ve now got the added advantage of being able to use voice commands to find movies etc. Fantastic. Well pleased and at a very good price. Highly recommend!

Name: mallorca80
Review Title: Great remote , but the software not quite as good
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 January 2021
Review Content: I really like the remote control as its so easy to navigate and it is a Bluetooth so doesn't actually need to be pointed to the tv. What I don't like is the newest version of the software - it won't show the icon of most of the sideloaded apps. It show grey squares only .I have one of the previous versions and no problem whatsoever with any icons of the apps .As I mainly use the stick with sideloaded apps it is a big let down , but hopefully this will be sorted in some of the following updates. Been using amazon prime for a nearly month so far - for its propose it is a great gadget . I would recommend  OTG cable and USB hub with RJ45 port so can be hard wired to the router for best performance and using memory stick too for your own videos

Name: david
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 February 2021
Review Content: Wanted one for the kitchen tv as we already have one for the living room.Actually find it a bit better than the more expensive one in there, possibly because it's a newer model. Of course the only downside is that this model has not got the volume control for the tv, but apart from that it's great.

Name: David Jakes
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 October 2020
Review Content: I previously had a first generation model. The "Lite" is much faster responding to the user. It looks no different to the other generation models. The only real difference is that it does not have any TV controls, but it really isn't needed. I am ordering another as a gift for a friend. Highly recommended.

Name: AlinaB
Review Title: Transforms old TV in smart TV!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: This is for who does not have a smart TV but would like the same advantages, all you need is a hdmi port, the rest is very easy to setup and you have access to Internet, netflix, amazon prime etc exactly like a smart TV, so if you don't want to change your TV yet I definitely recommend the fire stick, with or without a remote.

Name: Dave B
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 October 2020
Review Content: This was miraculous. Virtually plug and play. The stick certainly appeared to work better when plugged into mains rather than USB. A bit of time spent logging into various channels which was painless and  we were up and running. In retrospect may have chose more expensive version with TV controls but no problem. Fully recommend.

Name: T
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 December 2020
Review Content: So disappointed got this product to stream movies etc to a projector as a gift for my partner gave them to him, but the firetv stick remote control was not working. We spent 3 hrs on the phone being transferred to 7 different people in total in 7 different countries to resolve our problem and what made me very sad after all that time waiting the last man dealing with our problem he put the phone down on me. Terrible customer service I’d never buy from amazon again!

Name: tony forrest
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 October 2020
Review Content: Disappointed that that I cannot get BBC I player appI can from the internet but app not available

Name: Curly
Review Title: User menu is far to complicated
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 January 2021
Review Content: Each time you pause a film for a few minutes you have to restart the application such as Netflix from the start menu again.I also don't like that it has no sound output on starting the stick up and it has to be restarted through settings.Overall the menu is very long winded and the old menu design of an older stick is much better.

Name: Tieri
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 February 2021
Review Content: I usually rate Amazon devices but this was slow, unresponsive, and kept cutting out.The sound was so temperamental and would only work for short amounts of time.In the end I returned it and opted for the 4K fire stick, which is currently on offer for an extra £5.So far so good, and it is so much better than this version.

Name: Eck
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 December 2020
Review Content: 'Lite' version is just as capable & awesome as the full version & I'd highly recommend it as a Christmas present for a loved one. It not only provides TV but an abbundent of games for all ages - I know we want to keep kids away from TV 24/7 but the educational aspects {from some of the educational games} null that point & it's a proven fact that kids learn better through gameplay than classes & textbooks.Eck ~ Scottish nickname for Alex

Name: Kev
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 January 2021
Review Content: When it works it is fine, and much faster response than its predecessor - especially if used with the ethernet cable adaptor rather than wi-fi.  BUT every day or so when we come to use it we find there is video but no sound with it, necessitating it being unplugged and rebooted - then it's fine again.

Name: djm
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 February 2021
Review Content: Had the first Fire TV stick replaced, (after some haggling with the customer service assistants). The stick would freeze and lose audio every time it was switched off, forcing you to delete and restart  the whole setup. It has lost audio again since the replacement arrived but only once. Not happy.

Name: Eamonn Murphy
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 November 2020
Review Content: Out in the country, our broadband connection isn't great but this still works. Great for easy access to multiple television apps. You have to be careful to distinguish between what's free and what must be paid for but it does give you notice. Easy to use even for non-technical old duffer like me.

Name: Diver Paul
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 March 2021
Review Content: This stick was for my son's TV in his room.  We have another 1st gen stick in the living room.  The difference is huge.  The firestick that my son has sets up dead easy and he started using voice recognition straight away.  Menu is different as well, much better.  All in all its cracking device.

Name: Grant Cooper
Review Title: Bargain price, small issue tho with Amazon prime sport picture
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 January 2021
Review Content: Bought this before Xmas when reduced to £17.99, was a bargain for that price, I only gave it 3 stars for picture quality because of one small issue im having regarding prime sport, mainly the football, the pic is very bright and the motion not 100% smooth, I thought the problem might have been my internet speed but I tried watching the same football on prime using the prime app on my sky q box using the same internet and the pic was smoother + the brightness was lower and more real life like so the issue Def with the firestick, whether it's just a settings issue I don't know but for streaming TV programmes or films it's 5 stars, only the live streaming sport I'm having issue with

Name: A Mitchell
Review Title: Great value for miniaturized high tech
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 November 2020
Review Content: Had been using an old sony PS3 to access various streaming services for an old non smart TV. However, once BBCiplayer stopped being supported in October , time to invest in a cheap streaming stick. Invested in the basic firestick for £20.Once plugged in , set up was straight forward. Have been very happy with the range of streaming and catch services available. Good picture quality, and Alexa  functionality a useful add-on. All in all a very cost effective way to obtain most of the streaming and catch services available - just a shame Now TV not supported.

Name: Metalnik
Review Title: Really excellent oroduct and dead easy to setup
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 November 2020
Review Content: Only really  bought it to watch britbox. Wired it into the tv and automatically recognised  by wifi and in my alexa app - selected britbox app from start up menu. then  sends code to ipad  and up and running.Noticed picture quality  betteron apps  than via sky hd box and sony 4kbd player

Name: Darcy27
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 February 2021
Review Content: Bought for my grandad as he can’t get out the chair much these days so tv is all he has. He was over the moon!! The fact that he can speak to it and it will find what he wants is brilliant. He loves he’s Netflix and prime video - defo worth the money. I also have one and never had a problem.

Name: AJW
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 March 2021
Review Content: Best buy I have made in years providing a quick cheap upgrade to my ancient basic HD TV. I already have prime so took out a cheap Netflix subscription and am now spoilt for choice when it comes to viewing. Easy to set up and navigate the options. Just one regret - I should have done it sooner!

Name: POM
Review Title: Works perfectly with HD projector and enables phone streaming.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 January 2021
Review Content: Purchased to use with a projector. Perfect combination. I'm using https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B082TP8TMX/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_apa_fabc_67Y8Fb9VHPWNT Ape-man full HD projector. Movies are great. As an added bonus, it allows wireless phone streaming to the projector. Imagine a 300" high definition phone screen!

Name: Mark Skinner
Review Title: No as good as the previous model
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 February 2021
Review Content: I didn’t like the new layout it seem too bare where as the old screen layout looked fuller. The tool bar should be at the top of the page.  The remote doesn’t have volume controls which is poor for the price. The unit went down in price a week later. Not as good as the previous model in my view.

Name: Mr
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: Good stuff, cheap nfl streaming stick for us brits. Literally only got it for that purpose because our smart tv, consoles etc do the same thing so it’s really good.It is a bit clunky though and can be quite slow so if you’re upgrading a dumb tv, this might not be the thing for you...

Name: Dave
Review Title: Good product, good price, compatible with my 5 year old tv
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 November 2020
Review Content: Decided to stop paying for T.V Licence as the quality of television was not suited to my interests. Invested in Amazon Fire Stick as a replacement option for home entertainment. Good Selection of films, music, box sets and am pleased I made that choice for my own needs.I only had the basic so no complaints, only a slightly larger handset would be better for my own disability needs. however, I can operate it fully. So, not a complaint just a personal thing that I adjust to in my life.Recommend as a choice if you do not like television and paying for a tv licence.

Name: Rainking
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 November 2020
Review Content: Picture quality is excellent and number of apps plenty. Performance is also excellent. Managed to grab the stick while on sale and probably should have grabbed two. It helps to have signed up to prime and a few of the paid apps like Netflix etc... It’s easy to use, i.e. to pause and rewind.

Name: FS38
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 November 2020
Review Content: This is a low cost way to access, on older tv sets,  lots of channels and features available as standard on new smart tvs. Great value for money, fairly straightforward set up. Takes a little while to get used to navigating via the remote. Getting this meant not having to buy a new smart tv!

Name: graham whiteley
Review Title: Absolute bargain, it's a winner all around
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2021
Review Content: Got this model for under £18,, its a no brainer! Instantly installed in a few minutes,picture quality fabulous, remote super fast, I really can't fault it! I've a 4k one on the main TV, obviously the picture is slightly better, depending on the input! But I can highly recommend the cheaper one! The only thing it won't do is control your TV,but that's really irrelevant!

Name: darkcurrent
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: Bought this new version of the Fire TV Stick Lite for a 2nd TV and it is much better than the earlier generation(s).Biggest improvement seems to be reaction speed and, so far, this new version hasn't needed a hard reboot (power off and on) to resolve a screen freeze/no response issue.  Access to a better range of apps than when the older generation was launched although I haven't checked if I can access these newer apps with my first generation TV stick as yet.I would have preferred the remote with TV controls version but it wasn't in stock so went for this cheaper version and glad I did.

Name: D. Fenton
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 November 2020
Review Content: This fire stick lite now enables me to watch the Mandalorian and other series on Disney plus, so when the grandsons visit they can watch Pixar movies and Disney classics. Plus of course movies from the Marvel studios. I haven't tried the Alexa side of things yet though. I'm  old school.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2020
Review Content: Bought the fire stick lite for our very small, old TV downstairs. It's just as good as the full hd fire stick except you have to use the TV remote to do the volume and change over to the HDMI channel. I wouldn't be without it. I can use Amazon video, BBC I player, Amazon music, netflix etc. It's grand.

Name: The One!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 December 2020
Review Content: Ordered the 4k on black friday deal but mistakenly cancelled... it was the sold out so got this (at the higher price) :( Upgrades my old firestick and I'm very impressed. Very smooth and virtually no lag.Not too concerned about 4K but look forward to atmos on the Arc via DD+

Name: Gee
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 April 2021
Review Content: Absolutely incredible product. I have one within each room to be able to stream shows and programs. Able to save money off BT service as now not requiring all the channels provided.Perfect with Alexa, voice control so simple though you must be precise with what you say but after a while it becomes natural.Though this is the lite version its great.

Name: Mr. D. Smith
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 February 2021
Review Content: Wanted a small device for a wall mounted TV in the bedroom. This is perfect. I've gone through a lot of Android TV devices and for the money, this is one of the best I've had. I've got an expensive Nvidia shield in the living room and the fire stick is just as good for basic streaming

Name: FW
Review Title: Cheap to buy easy to use  it the biggest pain is signing to all iplayer, ITV Hub, etc
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 January 2021
Review Content: This the second TV firestick I have bought , the first was from currys PC World for my wife which is great for iplayer and  catchup tv, the second one is from Amazon and it's just as good it,s the lite version and after downloading updates and the apps I wanted,  we both use it mainly for Netflix HD version which is extremely good value and I have it on several devices. I also have a couple of Huawei boxes but they are very slow to start up each time you use them but the firestick is faster and is much better for my needs.I suppose all other versions work equally well but I have only used the basic firestick...

Name: Mrs Hutt
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 February 2021
Review Content: I haven't really used the whole lot of features so can't rate them. We have a Fire Stick in the living room which we use loads! I wanted one in the bedroom, which is this new one.  Just for watching something at bedtime it is perfect.  I will have a go with the voice controls and Alexa shortly

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 May 2021
Review Content: Bought this for a Samsung TV that has no WiFi as cheaper than getting a dongle. Plugged in and connected straight away to WiFi and my Amazon account. Downloaded all streaming services no problem and picture quality is great. Only downside is having to plug into the main and cable to power it from TV is £20 extra. Otherwise cannot fault it.

Name: Mr Diddles
Review Title: Parents love it, easy to use.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 May 2021
Review Content: I bought this for my parents as their TV is having problems connecting to WiFi and it works fantastic, I no longer get calls asking for help because the TV isn't working when they actually just went into the menu and don't know how to back out. Within 5 minutes of teaching them how to use it and letting them play around with it they already knew what was where and how to get on to each app.

Name: SleepingDogz
Review Title: A Great Device but buffers from time to time
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 January 2021
Review Content: Great Fast Navigation with in the menu compared to the Amazon fire stick 1st generation, only thing that lets it down is this new 2020 stick keeps buffering from time to time. The Alexa voice control is superb and saves time typing what you want to watch in the search bar. 8/10 overall.

Name: PRich
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 December 2020
Review Content: The Lite is very good but I'd be tempted to pay the extra and get the one with TV controls, mainly because of the convenience of one remote. They are great though and very easy to use. I really like the Alexa option, though it's not perfect, especially if searching for YouTube videos.

Name: KersReview
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 December 2020
Review Content: This has been a great move for a familyMember bedridden and limited to freeview. With aHDMI in her tv and with us having prime it was an ideal addition. She now has access to prime, Netflix, Disney+, loads of terrestrial on demand services and our kids can go up and watch the same things that glue them downstairs. Fantastic product and easy to install!

Name: KMills
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 January 2021
Review Content: The sounds keeps going off every few days.I’ve followed the instructions, changed things around and it still keeps going off!I have to pull the plug and reboot it. But every other day is getting really silly now.I’ve thrown the original box away so I can not return it

Name: S Wilkes
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 October 2020
Review Content: My son told us that our fire stick was out of date after I blamed the Internet for a very jerky streamed football match. I bought the new Fire Stick and the difference is amazing. Next game we watched had far better streaming and was on a par with watching on regular TV. Can use Alexa as well!

Name: Bokshi Sasa
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 November 2020
Review Content: Quite easy to set up apart from getting the apps like ITV player YouTube and so on. You have to go and set you your bank details and so on before it will let you download. There is no charge but it needs your card details.Picture is good and the Alexa remote works really well.

Name: Marie Marks
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 February 2021
Review Content: This was so easy to install and works brilliantly. It has updated our Sony Bravia completely. We can now watch Amazon prime, Netflix and all the catch up channels on this TV - which we couldn't before. It's a neat little remote control and is intuitive to use. Can't fault it - wish we'd done it ages ago. We don't have Alexa so I haven't scored that.

Name: D. M
Review Title: Even I could set this up
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 January 2021
Review Content: Easy to set up . Made me think why did I not buy this earlier . Attached to an older Sony tv in spare room giving them YouTube Netflix BBC iPlayer etc which I never thought would be possible so doesn't have to be a super up to date tv as long as it has a HDMI connection on the tv

Name: kate
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 January 2021
Review Content: I bought this for myself and my son as we only every watch Netflix, BBC iPlayer or Amazon. It works absolutely fine, the remote is fine, the only downfall is that the sound sometimes doesn't work so I have to plug it in and out but I'm unsure if that's down to the stick or my TV.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Title: Like it but can't get surround sound to work
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 January 2021
Review Content: I like this new stick. It is responsive and easy to use. However, I can't get the surround sound to work with my soundbar. Only stereo works. Tried all the sound settings. I get Dolby 5.1 from my BT box working fine  when connected to the HDMI port on the soundbar or via ARC from the TV but just can't get this to work from the Fire Stick with the same connection. I see there are a few other reviewers with the same problem. I hope they look at this and fix what looks like a compatibility issue.

Name: Charlie woo
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 January 2021
Review Content: Can't watch certain apps as the voices are out of sync especially on Disney plus app went through all trouble shooting customer service was really helpful and sent me a new one and the new one is the same voices out of sync so can't watch it disappointing as I have a old version of firestick and had no problems

Name: (Connor) BIG MAN SHOUT
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2021
Review Content: I have recently purchased this for my niece and here are the pros and cons I have found with this product.Pros) I like the new set up, it was a bit confusing at the start due to the old set up but got very easy to understand.Cons) Its £30 with no volume controls but last year I bought a fire tv stick with volume controls for only £30 and is now £39.99!

Name: Mark
Review Title: Turned my old led monitor into smart tv :)
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 November 2020
Review Content: Flawless installation, apps downloading and syncing with my Amazon account. I can watch now on my 9 yr old monitor YouTube, Netflix, prime movies, music, bbc, itv, etc. It's quick and responsive, no lags. My monitor is only 1080p so don't need 4k. Picture quality is great. Very happy. Highly recommend.

Name: Deryck G
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 December 2020
Review Content: Arrived quickly and easy to install although I have not linked Alexa as she is working downstairs and TV stick upstairs at the back of house. It has bred new life into an aging TV with clear picture and a good range of apps.

Name: ajsr39
Review Title: Great value, all stresming apps in one location
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 January 2021
Review Content: Love everything about this firestick. Was bought as a gift and I love it. So easy to use. Only downside is the amount you have to pay for on prime. However, good stick for other apps which are quick to manoeuvre with non-buffering streams. I have borrowed a friends firestick with the tv controls and can say I see no difference therefore this is a very good value for money.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Title: Good, but prefer the old home screen
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2021
Review Content: Bought for my mum as a gift after she saw ours and wanted one. This is a newer version than the one we have but just as easy to use, although I do prefer the older interface and home screen. We had a few problems with the remote, probably a dodgy battery connection but seems to be working fine now we've fiddled with it a bit.

Name: Mujib
Review Title: FAILTY AMAZON FIRE STICK, NEED REPLACEMENT PLEASE.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 April 2021
Review Content: Quick delivery which i was happy about, but once i put everything together and plugged it into my tv it just does not CONNECT. i've done EVERYthing, tried to troubleshoot, i followed instruction from Amazon support team, followed instruction manual book, reset the device, used all adapters and mixed around with set up of wiring, reset internet connection, used wifi and ethernet cable, nothing seems to work. I even tried on another tv and i get know where. It must be a FAULTY STICK. please send another AMAZON. i have spent hours trying to connect and not even passing 1st stage on connecting to internet via wifi nor cable, even tried using WPS button. Please send another, very disappointed and frustrated.

Name: paul wheeldon
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 January 2021
Review Content: I already had one Firestick in the back of my TV so I got my self another for my projector as my projector native hd.. so got Firestick TV lite so I did not have to keep borrowing the one from the TV. When it came it was easy to setup and use. Me personally I like the Firestick.

Name: david cadwallader
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 March 2021
Review Content: I don't have a smart television at the moment,so bought the fire stick to extend my viewing options,and WOW what a difference it can make i should have bought one years ago,to anyone who doesn't have a smart television and would like extra viewing options they should purchase one.

Name: Barbara D
Review Title: There is no way of controlling the volume using this device.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 January 2021
Review Content: I had thought that we would be able to use the volume controls on the tv remote control to manage the volume but this is not the case. When we tried out the fire stick we found that whilst the volume for speech was tolerable [and we are slightly deaf] the volume level of introductory and background music was far too loud, excruciatingly so! I would not recommend buying this device and feel we have wasted our money.Also, when setting up the device, we were given choices of apps. Once these choices are made there does not appear to be any way of altering or adding to them.

Name: Anon
Review Title: Seems to work fine ok so far
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2021
Review Content: Seems to work so far..... Got this due to our TV no longer being able to receive iPlayer (and couldn't get 4OD or ITVHub !). Works fine on all terrestrial channels I mentioned and more. I only use it for the normal free channels.  Just in case you're not aware when setting this up, to use your remote to switch to the 'HTMI' option as that's where you go through the wizard instructions to set it up. May sound obvious but I just thought things popped up on your screen and didn't realise :-)

Name: Scott O'Leary
Review Title: Easy use, great addition to my home entertainment options. Thanks.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 February 2021
Review Content: The Fire stick itself was a Christmas present (I was already an Amazon Prime user for ordering things but scarcely used Amazon TV/Video until I got the Fire stick) Pretty straightforward to use, great addition to my home entertainment options, nothing to say against it so far.

Name: Susan Osgathorp
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 February 2021
Review Content: My old Firestick seemed to having problems connecting to iPlayer etc, and frequently stopped. But this new Firestick was very easy to install and works quickly and efficiently. The addition of the Alexa voice recognition feature is a real bonus, as it saves a lot of time trying to remember when and where a programme that we want to watch is to be found!

Name: R. Read
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: This was purchased for me as a very welcome Christmas present.  I stopped using the 'Big' tv service providers as it was costing sooooo much for what I could get for nothing (Freestat).  This is the same item as I have in my lounge tv except that one has volume control as well.  It is great for getting extra bits on the tv for my grandchildren.

Name: Anne G
Review Title: Why didn't I buy it sooner?
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: This is a very good add on and has converted my TV into a smart tv with many features all for a low cost. It is easy to use and the picture quality and options are good.I have marked down Alexa, as I do not use the function but for those who do, I am sure it is very good.

Name: Ralphy, Newcastle upon Tyne.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 November 2020
Review Content: Well I didn't expect a firestick lite to be that fast?Lighting quick to access my apps and programmes and no noticeable lag at all!No volume controls on the remote which is irrelevant for our use tbh!Got this on a black Friday deal too!Result 👍😁

Name: Caroline Smith
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2021
Review Content: So much faster than my old firestick.  Voice control is brilliant, "show me horror movies with prime", can ask to fast forward or rewind.  It also works when not on TV firestick channel, asked it to play one of my playlists and it switched over to correct channel itself.

Name: Ian Hen
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 March 2021
Review Content: The stick was very good value and was easy to set up, because I was an Amazon prime member my details were already on the stick. Information for movies and TV shows very easy to find, stick lets you pick the genre you are looking for and Alexa helps you find specific programmes easily.

Name: Chuck
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2021
Review Content: Decent product,  fair price, delivered on time. Don't use Alexa but User Interface with Remote Control simple, intuitive and responsive. Easy access to Prime content and gave my ageing Viera TV a new lease of life with the browsing capability. Good value, works for me.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2021
Review Content: fast delivery easy to set up and use, but once left off for an hour or so you cant turn it back on from the remote, has to be turned off by the power supply/plug to get it to come back on tried all the usual fixes new remote batts different power suply diff tv's different ports no luck, So rang amazon and received a replacement and yep exactly the same, did bit research and seems to be quite common with no solution as of yet. Also some times apps will open but nothing will be displayed can still here sound but no picture again a restart is needed, really disappointing always had firesticks but might switch to a roku if this doesnt get resolved soon.

Name: cwhite
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 January 2021
Review Content: Life-saver! I hadn’t had TV for 2 years. I found the £75 fee for cable unjustifiable. On my own at Christmas because of shielding ( for 9 months by then) decided to risk buying the Fire stick. What a relegation. Just brilliant. Only downside is I want to watch TV all day instead of working from home!Did loose the sound on Christmas Eve and it took me 12 hours to realise I only needed to restart the Fire Stick.

Name: Alexdakid
Review Title: Great smart features and good value for money
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 December 2020
Review Content: Was brought a fire stick lite by my brother and his wife for an Christmas present and love it it runs really quick and takes seconds to set up the only thing I don’t like is the remote doesn’t have volume controls or turns my tv on or off other then that it’s amazing

Name: NAM
Review Title: Didn’t work, had to return. Disappointing.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 March 2021
Review Content: Did not work - kept freezing while trying to set it up. I have an older firestick which works perfectly, bought this one for second tv, spent a very frustrating few hours trying to work out why it wouldn’t even complete set out, gave up on the end, returned it and bought a Roku streaming stick instead, which has been absolutely brilliant.

Name: Nathan bath
Review Title: It's great for smart devices connect with your alexa
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 February 2021
Review Content: I suppose it's ok but occasionally it's shuts down reboots automatically then does it again so I shut it down and everything works for a few hours then it starts again tried factory reboots and so far it hasn't done it twice just once as if it's looking for something

Name: sarah lewis
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2021
