Review Content: I bought the alexa voice control as i had the older one without as this was on offer i thought why not but i have to say im not overly impressed some things i ask for alexa tells me she cant process that information for example i asked to show me the film bella mafia which alexa couldnt comprehend so i asked for films about women mafia bosses and it said it couldnt comprehend this has happened when trying to search several film titles varying in subject & themes greatly including xmas, Other than that its what i expected soi give it 3.5*

Name: Pete N
Review Title: Quick to setup and easy to use
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 January 2021
Review Content: Bought as a replacement for an older fire stick, and can see and feel the improvement.Quick response to turning on, searching, and the Alexa integration is intuitive with the search function working across apps to find programmes.We’ve already found ourselves using it more than the old device.

Name: Mr R Brierley
Review Title: Ok (I guess) if you have fast broadband
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 December 2020
Review Content: Easy to set up and use with good remote. Audio flakey tho. My download speed is about 8Mbps and audio cuts out totally every few minutes when streaming a movie or youtube so it’s useless for me. I’m back using my Humax box or PS3 for streaming as they don’t cut out.

Name: Coypu
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 February 2021
Review Content: My kitchen telly just had an aerial so we were only able to watch live tv. My daughter got one of these for her tv so I decided to get one for our kitchen. It is really good. We can now choose to watch catch-up, Prime, Netflix and You Tube. Very good picture as well.

Name: martin broad
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 January 2021
Review Content: Bought as i did not like the interface on my smart tv and also it was on a special deal. Very easy to set up and works well including the voice recognition.Only drawback is sometimes loses network even though the wi fi is working so i have to pull out the power lead and replace.

Name: Jengen
Review Title: It connected quite easily and works well.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 January 2021
Review Content: We fitted it into the HDMI socket on the back of our Sonia Bravia tv. The instructions are shown on the screen and are very clear.It recognised our hub and now streams all4 iPlayer etc. It seems to work very well although we haven’t really given Alexa a good trial yet.

Name: Susie Brooks
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 February 2021
Review Content: More like a downgrade than an upgrade from the previous version - this is brilliantly named for being 'Lite' in all respects! Every time I want to use it, I have to unplug and reset it or it just crackles and says there's no signal or gives me a blank/static screen. Even when it connects, it often says 'Home is unavailable' and refuses to display any apps. I thought it must be faulty so sent it back, but the replacement does exactly the same. My TV fits all the compatibility criteria, my Wifi is good; I've spent fruitless hours chatting to tech support (rubbish). Glad I didn't throw away my old firestick - it's slow but at least it works!

Name: j willett
Review Title: Loads up much faster than the original one i had,
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 October 2020
Review Content: Bought mainly for the Apple tv app, which my old stick did not have, signal dropped out once last night can only assume this was down to Amazon as when i checked said my connection was fine with no problems, re-started Fire -Stick which now only takes a minute or so and everything was working again.

Name: P. Elliott
Review Title: Super easy to set up and use
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 November 2020
Review Content: Really like this additional to my Alexa family, so easy to set up and use and love being able to ask Alexa verbally what we want to watch and it finding it and playing it. Good apps also available for most streaming services I needed (shame NowTV isn’t available)

Name: Mrs Tracy Johnson
Review Title: Extremely pleased and great picture.  Very easy set up
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 January 2021
Review Content: After using my old one for approx 8 years it finally packed up so ordered this product. Wow.. Technology come a long way since and love it especially Alexa voice control.  Brilliant picture and so easy to install. Can definately recommend. Wish I'd done it years ago.

Name: Ray daniel
Review Title: Easy to set up for a dinosaur
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 December 2020
Review Content: Just bought the firestick life latest generation,I'm no geek,but found it easy to set up on my old tv,hardest part was remembering my Amazon password.The alexa part worked first time,now it don't,not sure if it's me or I'm doing something wrong,anyone know help.

Name: carolyn m wilson
Review Title: Great improvement on my 8 year old firestick
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 January 2021
Review Content: Great upgrade from my original fire stick . Little or no buffering, features are easy to use . Only downside is the remote that comes with it . If it had a back light it would be better so I use a small wireless remote control keyboard the majority of the time.

Name: TP
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 January 2021
Review Content: The picture quality etc is great however it is impossible to change the time and the remote is temperamental, having to rearrange the batteries to unfreeze it (the batteries are the ones that came with it so not drained) Also had a lot of problems using Audible library on the tv.

Name: Megan Kane
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 November 2020
Review Content: Really handy to use and set up, makes it so much easier to use all of my streaming accounts. You can only use alexa when you've already scrolled into the search section of amazon prime and nowhere else which is the biggest shame. They also need to fix the bug that blocks amazon prime for working. I googled it and it seems quite a few other people had the same issue, I followed the instructions to fix it and never worked so now I have to actually click into the prime video app rather than just using the stick home screen. It is a good little gadget other than that so if they fixed that, it'd be perfect.

Name: A Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 February 2021
Review Content: badly manufacture hdmi port meant first one had to be replaced., biggest problem was a power cut it restarts but because wifi, the router is also rebooting, meaning the stick blacks out because it cant do a update check because it always does on powering up.Also no where as near as powerful as advertised - it couldn't run exviz cctv video stream on anything less than lowbit rate, while a chinese android box at half the price can. Maybe a bit of the processor is too low spec and the fact that it has an appalling 1mb only of ram! like a 1995 winPC!Was no use to me

Name: Skylar
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 January 2021
Review Content: I bought this in the sale as an upgrade to my existing old firestick, and it is a definite improvement.  The newer menu style is easier to navigate and the picture is clearer. I really wasn't that bothered about 'Alexa' tbh, but am now converted! It makes finding programmes and films so much easier.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 February 2021
Review Content: Despite acknowledging that there is full wifi connection, it will not allow me to use the main menu. Voice instructions are completely hit and miss - mostly miss.  I ask for something simple like BBC iplayer and I get three dots going round and round. Occasionally I will ask for a programme and it will magically appear, but 9 out of 10 times - absolutely nothing.The sound has now gone. I have spent more time googling how to rectify problems than I have spent watching programmes. A complete waste of money and hugely frustrating. Arghhhhh!!!

Name: Simona
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2021
Review Content: I'm very impressed with this little device, a great addition to my home. Easy to set-up, I plugged it into my projector and the quality of the image is impressive. Moreover, I was able to connect my Bluetooth speaker for improved sound performance. I can now control the TV with both my echo dot and the fire TV controller. I'm eager to explore what else this has to offer.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 March 2021
Review Content: This was delivered on time, well packaged and easy to start to use. I brought this as I wanted to watch the Disney + app as soon as I had installed the firestick it was so easy to follow to add any apps that you want to add on, so I got all the apps I wanted. movie nights in now is just one click away and streaming with easy. Just what you need in the current times with covid and not being able to go out.

Name: NanaT
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: Bought two sticks as Christmas gifts so I cannot comment on the voice recognition or Alexa integration aspects, unfortunately.  But I have been made aware that the picture quality was good - and the Lite version did not compromise the users’ enjoyment at all

Name: mdkett
Review Title: Plugged in and set up easily
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 January 2021
Review Content: Liked the ease of set-up - a bit tedious having to register channels as they were selected but variety of films and programs compensate for this particularly as Amazon Prime member. Just needs playing with to get used to all of the functions - worth the price

Name: Goldie29
Review Title: Plug in and off to go!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 April 2021
Review Content: This is an excellent gadget. Easy to set up and has a really good range of channels and access to platforms such as Netflix. It’s easy to use. The strength of your broadband/wifi will make a difference but I’ve got an average speed package and it works fine.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Title: Does what it says it will do.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 January 2021
Review Content: It is, so far, my only Alexa product and has worked any time I have used it. I can not comment on integration.It was purchased to backup very poor TV reception but I have limited data on my broadband so it is not on all the time. When I have used it, it has performed faultlessly through this first month.Amazon get a strong rating from me.

Name: Mark
Review Title: Awesome bit of kit. Well worth a purchase
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 December 2020
Review Content: Such a bargain for £17.... Highly recommended the stick lite to anyone that wants to bring smart features to their TV. I use mine with Plex from my home pc as server. Works a treat. Also lots of other things you can side load as well if you can be bothered.

Name: Annie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 April 2021
Review Content: I'm glad I acquired a newer version of the firestick. It is a great improvment over the one that it replaced. HOWEVER, when the day comes that I am so lazy I need to give instructions to a machine rather than pressing a button, then I will stop watching and get a life!!

Name: Ce'anne
Review Title: A must have in every home!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 November 2020
Review Content: I’ve had a now tv box for years but it became a pain to pay so much for only a few channels and seeing as I already paid for prime I thought I’d make the change to the fire stick instead. I wish I’d done this years ago! It has so many apps available to download, such as prime video, Netflix, starzplay, Amazon music, Disney+, catch-up tv and many more. I love the voice remote! It does have buttons for access but no volume or power buttons, I’m not sure if the other stick does. I will say, I love the fire stick so much I bought one for my dad and another one for my bedroom tv. Super handy to have.

Name: Angela
Review Title: Simple and easy to setup and use
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: This is a nice unit which settled in easily with my Alexa family.  Easy to set up and use. Took a little time to get used to the different menu layout to my other firestick. But is a bit more straightforward and less busy than the other menu which is a bonus.

Name: Danielle
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 February 2021
Review Content: I wasn’t sure how useful this would be when I bought it but I’m so happy with it. My TV isn’t a smart tv so this gives me access to all the apps I’m missing. It allows me to watch NowTv, Amazon Prime, Netflix, YouTube and all the on demand channels without having to buy a new TV.

Name: Maxie
Review Title: This just hide behind the TV !
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 December 2020
Review Content: This little Fire stick is so affordable. Therefore, decided to have one on the kitchen TV as well. Works well with Wi-Fi, giving access to all the TV  channels I love.The picture & sound quality is top class. Got it at a good price on Black Friday.Thanks Amazon !

Name: Finn
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 November 2020
Review Content: I love everything about it . Easy to install and within a few mins you are good to go !So impressed, this is the 2nd I have got for my home. Lots of steaming choices which enabled me to downgrade my sky package and save me money, so they’ve  literally paid for them selves in a few months.

Name: alexi
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 December 2020
Review Content: If you have not got a Fire stick, get one it is a very nifty piece of kitAlthough the lite version is the cheapest it won't disappointand is a worthwhile up grade on 2nd generation Fire stickMuch faster and less buffering when streaming

Name: Nadine Hall
Review Title: Annoyed as it was for convenience
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 March 2021
Review Content: My issues is I’m having problems with my device finding it unless I unplug it and plug it in again and it’s every night since I got it. Tried contacting Amazon and they were no help. I have another stick that’s a lite and no problems neither is the 4K fire stick but they’re on different TVs. The tv I’m having issues with is a sharp. LG and Sony work fine.

Name: me myself and I
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 February 2021
Review Content: Fab  easy to set up and install required apps.Voice command is amusing but difficult when playing with the diff languages (as you do )  don't need to buy the USB power lead it advertises to buy with it , as the plug lead it comes with works fine for it . Also chances are  , you can use your usual TV remote to work it (some times you need  to set this up via the TV,  ours just worked right away , found out by accident hahah)  will be buying another soon

Name: Happy shopper
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 November 2020
Review Content: Amazing device that everyone should have. This allows you to take your TV with you anywhere. Watch on your laptop or TV . Simply plug in , login to your account and download your apps. Then you have BBC Iplayer, ITV , Netflix, YouTube and many more. Perfect

Name: Caroline
Review Title: Get plenty of batteries in stock

Review Content: Remote eats battery life for fun and you have to really push the buttons sometimes several times in order for it to work . We have 3 so it’s not just a dodgy remote.As for the Amazon prime and Netflix programmes that we have they are great I don’t miss sky or the pricey bills !!!

Name: gussie
Review Title: works fast , depending on source and internet speed, picture is brilliant
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 January 2021
Review Content: took some time to get used to the new layout, but works brilliantly so far, dont feel any difference as using it with tv and projectors that controls not needed for , ok its two remotes or a remote and phone or tablet with fire tv app, but its working great.

Name: ajt
Review Title: Turned my 12 year old tv into a smart tv......

Review Content: I'm a pensioner and easily worked out how to convert my old bedroom tv into a smart tv......so easy to use and have had no problems.....very pleased to be able to catch up with my programmes when my other half is watching BT sport on the downstairs tv.

Name: TCISam
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 January 2021
Review Content: Our Sony TV is 6 years old, so not SMART.  This made such a difference.  Works brilliantly with the wi-fi, and can watch everything on every streaming service.  Love the fact that it plays YouTube so clearly.  If you haven't got a smart TV this is the way to go.

Name: L Grego
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 January 2021
Review Content: We ordered this so that we could watch Netflix and Disney + on our  Samsung TV upstairs. it was easy to install after a slight hitch witch may have been my lack of tech knowledge.Easy to use, only downside is that you can't put SKY Go on it

Name: Andy R
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 December 2020
Review Content: Loving the lite version of the firestuck. Bought when at £17.99 so was a real no brainer. The UI is much nicer than my other devices so am hoping they will update at some point. Would buy again at the same price as replacements for the older models I own.

Name: D C.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 January 2021
Review Content: Wanted this to get Apple TV, and Disney +. Plug and play dead easy. I have got prime on my 4K tv, and on Virgin Media, but the fire stick offers loads of apps. Personally I can’t see much difference between HD and 4K. The picture on this is top notch.

Name: Joanna
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 December 2020
Review Content: Great purchase for £19.99 usually retail at £40.Fast delivery.Easy to install/upload.Simple and easy remote to use.Definitely recommend.We ended up buying 2 ! one for our bedroom (already have one in the lounge) & one for my Dad.

Name: Tim D.
Review Title: It’s simple to use but can completely take over your viewing.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2021
Review Content: Simple to setup and use, easy to integrate with my existing account.Would be 1000 times better if it could give you guide showing what’s on now, next and before from all your selected channels. No linear catch up function on ITV.Highly recommend.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 December 2020
Review Content: I'm amazed at all the positive reviews. The Amazon fire stick reminded me of being on a flight and scrolling though the in-flight tv guide trying to find something of interest to watch - and failing! There's simply nothing on there that I'm interested in watching.  I sent it back for a refund.

Name: Ian Guile
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 November 2020
Review Content: The alexa is brilliant and it doesn't just control the channels but also answers questions and sets timers! There are hundreds of channels and thousands of films! Overall i love this gadget and can't recommend it highly enough! F A N T A S T I C!!!!

Name: NK
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 March 2021
Review Content: It is easy to install the Fire TV Stick with good step by step instructions.  Once installed and set up, there are no instructions on the stick's functionality.  After using it for 2 days, the sound was no longer there, so I had to remove the stick and put it back and this seemed to do the trick.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 January 2021
Review Content: Hi, the unit is small and compact , and easy to install and use. It does however have a problem. The fire stick frequently loses connection to the tv. This results in lose of signal, each time lasts about about 5sec, and can happen there or four times a minute. This is really annoying, it’s an intermittent fault but it’s really of putting. If I had known about this problem I would have had second thoughts about purchasing the fire stick.Regards

Name: mali786j
Review Title: Superb TV viewing and don’t need SKY anymore!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 December 2020
Review Content: Excellent and working superb. First updated and downloaded all programs using supplied power adapter. Then connected to Samsung LED TV 55” wall mounted and used the USB 2.0 port for power using a chromecast usb cable. All working perfectly. Do not need to buy Amazon £20 usb cable for direct tv power. Amazon firestick is millions time faster and better than chromecast for TV viewing of online TV channels and video contents. Simply awesome! Buy it and worth every penny!

Name: nicola burke
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 February 2021
Review Content: i bought this for my daughters room as there was no aerial it was so easy to set up i bought another one for the other daughters room.Now they can go and watch there own programme or the youngest plays gamesDefinatly recommend although i have heard using with alexa is good although we do not have one

Name: paulbear
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: Bought it during the Black Friday deals so it was less than £20.  Excellent way to add media content toa stand alone computer monitor.  So now I can watch podcasts, Youtube, TV series and films from my Amazon Prime account whilst in my home office.

Name: munisha kobia
Review Title: One of my best amazon purchases!

Review Content: I love how affordable this is. It does everything I expected it to and so I would really recommend. I am a university student who wanted something cheap and affordable and it’s exactly that. I can watch everything on it. It also comes with an extra connecter that speeds up your wifi, so theres no wifi issues. The only downside is that it is quite small so easily gets lost and the Alexa aspect of it , isn’t really integrated as much as it seems. You won’t really require Alexa because the operationalising of the remote is quite basic anyway. But would definitely recommend for TVs.

Name: LegendAlex
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 January 2021
Review Content: Where do I begin it great for watching all your shows, it has various popular streaming apps such as Netflix and Disney plus and many more you are also able to get 3rd party apps too the only reason I haven't given 5 stars is the fact that after a month of use the back cover of the remote falls off very easily and is easy to lose.  The alexa works amazingly well and even does most stuff normal alexa does

Name: Jenn
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 December 2020
Review Content: I decided as we are heading into winter and lockdown to have a second firestick for upstairs TV in bedroom. I also suffer insomnia and it means I have a wide range to watch or listen to. Easy to set up and as I owned all the apps  I wanted easy to download them

Name: Chub
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 December 2020
Review Content: My YouView box died and to get a replacement was gonna cost me a 2 year Broadband update or £160!Tried this and it's brilliant much better far than the YouView box.So, this and a year's Amazon Prime on a Black Friday deal Well Pleased.

Name: Mr M.

Name: ROGER D.

Review Content: Personally speaking, I don't like the new layout, found it hard to navigate around the new stick, preferring the older versions. The price reflects its features, sadly would not recommend, and would prefer to spend the extra and buy a 4k version.

Name: Nick C.

Name: Maurice Taylor

Review Content: I bought this because I needed a replacement controller and this was the same price as  a controller alone. Name: gary whitehead
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 November 2020
Review Content: I've had the 1st generation fire stick for a few years now.It is slow even after factory reset.Upgraded to this and wow!Much much faster and impressedNot bothered about volume as have them on my remote.Alexa is great also.Upgrade to this

Name: dc
Review Title: Easy to use but needs stable USB supply.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 December 2020
Review Content: Make sure you have a good power supply. It does not like some USB ports like the ones on TVs. Apart from that, set up is straight forward and easy to use. Remote does not need line of sight to work so don't worry about where the dongle plugs in behind the TV.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 January 2021
Review Content: Very happy with my fire stick! Signal strength is great for watching TV in my room which my Chromecast seems to struggle with and it does everything I want it to! Got it at the bargain price of £17.99 which made me even more happy with my purchase!

Name: Amazondg
Review Title: Very good value for money, very fast.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 December 2020
Review Content: Just as good as the HD version. Using on a small screen for kids room and it is perfect. Just as fast as the HD version. Only difference is that is has the new menu layout which is fine. Not missing the tv volume controls  yet, but this may be a downside for someone.

Name: Rich
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 January 2021
Review Content: Bought as a gift but very impressed newer version than mine and it's noticeably quicker and navigation is a bit easier too.A great addition to any home that has multiple accounts Disney, Netflix, prime etc all in one place and can be moved from TV to TV 👍

Review Content: Do not buy.Had my new lite firestick for a month was ok until new software  update.Now useless. Name: K C.
Review Title: Works well and good picture but some annoying features.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 April 2021
Review Content: The unit is easy to set up and provides decent picture and sound. You may need to fiddle with the sound settings a bit though. The most annoying thing is that if you are watching a series (season) of TV shows, it often reverts to season 1 Episode 1 when you first switch on. Then you have to go through the whole lot to find the episode you want to watch. This only happens on one channel. Some shows start playing straight away before you have pressed play. That can be annoying too.

Name: annmarie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2021
Review Content: never had one before but was easy to install plug in and get code from amazonjust got used to itand it updated now im trying to work out how it works againi like that i can use other apps oncool device

Name: Wendy
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: Bought as a gift. The first one to arrive was faulty but Amazon were extremely helpful and a replacement arrived the next day.Easily installed and the recipient of the gift is very happy with it. Easy to navigate around the various features. Great value for money.

Name: MATHEUS CARMIGNANI SALVADOR
Review Title: Awesome but lacks cell phone integration
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 March 2021
Review Content: I had a Chrome Cast before and decided to get the Firestick. It is really awesome and it integrates all the best apps and services into one and it goes back and forth in between the services in a really seamless maner. But one thing my old Chrome Cast really crushes the Firestick is how well it integrated with my and anyone's cell phone. The Fire Stick doesn't mirror the screen, doesn't stream cell phone files, has few streaming options and overall way less freedom than the Chrome Cast I used to have. If I knew that beforehand I would've gone for the Chrome Cast again.

Name: P.Preston
Review Title: It's probably OK for Prime Subscribers
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 February 2021
Review Content: I didn't get on with it at all.The voice recognition didn't work very well.It had difficulty finding programs I wanted to watch.It's probably OK for Prime SubscribersI prefer to find what I want on my PC or tablet or phone then cast it to my TV via a ChromeStick

Name: moira
Review Title: I connected the Fire Stick to the TV my self ,

Review Content: I connected the Fire Stick to the TV my self and it did not take long before I had it working ,The photo is off the TV ,The Fall I have been watching the past few days ,I have not had any problems the picture is really good ,I am 64yrs old and if I can set it up anyone can ,

Name: Lost
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 November 2020
Review Content: I’ve been using a PS4 for my netflix and prime video for ages now and decided to get one of these little things. Cannot fault it at all. I was a bit apprehensive that with it being the “lite” that I’d miss some features of the original fire stick but if you don’t mind using the tv remote for volume then you’re not gonna miss anything.

Name: Rosie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 January 2021
Review Content: AMAZING!! This devise is so good, it allows for Netflix, iplayer, Disney plus, amazon prime, itv player, YouTube etc! Very easy to use and the Alexa function is so handy, you can ask it to find any film and it will get all options up across the different services. This has transformed our old tv into a smart tv for a cheap price which is amazing. The picture is very high quality even for this cheaper version. 10/10 would defiantly recommend.

Name: Capo
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 November 2020
Review Content: A fire cube is best option of fore devices4k sticks , passableThe previous non 4k sticks were more than passable and the best option before being discontinued basically by Amazon to make people purchase the 4k or the new edition liteLite sticks .....not much to say .....other than....if you buy one you're an idiot , they are pathetic

Name: Mr. E. Wilson
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 January 2021
Review Content: I was a bit dubious about buying a fire stick as I wasn't sure how it worked or even if it was any good. In the end I decided to take a chance and got one. Just plug it in to an HDMI slot on your TV, link it to your home wifi and your good to go. I bought it just before Christmas 20 and so far I haven't stopped watching all the free stuff. There's plenty of free and also plenty of other stuff which either needs a subscription or can just pay a small fee to watch. Recommended!

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Title: Why didn’t I do this sooner?!
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2021
Review Content: I’ve only had Freeview up until now and never watched much T.V., but really wanted to access Netflix because of the quality of drama it offers. I really miss being able to visit the cinema. With so much time to spare in lockdown, I consider this purchase an investment in my mental health and well-being.

Name: Lee A.
Review Title: The fire stick is well worth the price and offers a great streaming service
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 March 2021
Review Content: Great bit of kit, very easy to set up and get going. Very good quality play back as long as you have a decent fast internet connection, the actual stick is well made and feels very robust.The only niggle is that I cant control volume via voice remote

Name: JHH
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2021
Review Content: This was a gift and has made such a difference being able to view Netflix and BBC iplayer etc.on my TV rather than on my small PC screen. I do not have Alexa so can not comment on voice recognition etc. My only question is why did I wait so long before getting one !

Name: esme
Review Title: Sadly, you need this if your stick is over 2 years old
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 January 2021
Review Content: Amazon tv kept freezing, crashing, very slow, etc, and got worse. Amazon said I need upgrade as stick is nearly 3 years old! Really?Now ATV is working fine. I waited till it was on special price. I do prefer the new menu setup tbh...

Name: Callum
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 May 2021
Review Content: I was quite liking this product for the first couple of months using it, worked reasonably well and ultimately did what it said on the tin.Unfortunately, that changed recently when the remote stopped working. Despite several changes of battery and multiple attempts to re-pair or fix, nothing has worked and the entire thing is now unusable.Ultimately, I've paid £30 for a couple months worth of TV and will now need to re-order as amazon don't want to issue a refund

Name: Tauren Jay
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 February 2021
Review Content: The firestick streams well, and connects well with alexa devices to make a great home system. However it kept going to no signal and the only way to correct it was to unplug it and plug it back in again. Plus the remote isn't as sturdy or nicely finished as others I have used with other manufacturers.

Name: Printskill
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: Easy to set up. Knowing a bit more about my tv controls would have made it easier. Picture quality and alexa excellent. Name: john solley

Use the supplied cable, folks!Otherwise, everything was fine and now we've got all the extra features.

Name: Dan

Review Content: I have 3 fire sticks in my house and this one was purchased for my daughters room and i haven't seen them since Christmas day i love the voice activation its fantastic that you can install apps and builds to enhance your viewing pleasure

Name: Thomas McLellan
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 October 2020
Review Content: I like it very much obviously with no tv control being the only minus but I knew that before I bought it. It is so fast at downloading and that makes it great value for money. I would recommend this to anybody Who needs a streaming device.

Name: sonia couzens.

Review Content: Ordered as a 2nd addition, my other is 3 years old.The Guide button only show's for MY 5, Not any other's like ITV HUB,BBC iPLAYER, and All 4 even tho they are all down loaded. Then down loaded a tv guide but that isn't connecting to the fire stick either.

Name: veronica June
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 March 2021
Review Content: I have had an Amazon Fire Stick for many years decided an upgrade would improve the quality and it does brilliantly.  The only problem I have is with Doscovery plus which I have downloaded but have to sign in each time I want to use it.

Name: Kevin
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 February 2021
Review Content: With my Wi-Fi and Amazon passwords to hand, it was very quick and easy to set up. The TV button gives quick access to live TV streams, it integrates with My5 and Pluto but not iPlayer, ITV hub, All4, UKTV play or Discovery Plus. I am cannot install Virgin Media's TV Control app, it appears to have been removed from Amazon's app store. There are cheaper Android TV boxes with an Ethernet port, USB ports and Google Play installed. The Firestick is a dedicated streaming device, it performs faster and feels more intuitive than these Android boxes. Virgin's TV Control app is worth 2 stars.

Name: Mark
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 October 2020
Review Content: This is the second fire stick I have, the first being an earlier version with no voice control. Really easy to set up, just plug it into a hdmi socket, connect the power cable, connect to your wifi and follow the on screen setup. Great!

Name: M. Young
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 March 2021
Review Content: SO much faster than the first gen one we had.  No more buffering, stalling, or problems connecting to the TV.  Some great new features too.  Integrated apps on the Home screen makes finding stuff on Netflix a breeze.We don't use the voice recognition so can't comment on that feature.Would totally recommend this new device.

Name: Steve Harrison
Review Title: Great value fire TV stick. Easy to install.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 January 2021
Review Content: At this price great value. Replaced old fire stick and was  easy to install as downloaded from the cloud all the apps in my prime account to this new stickWith prime account a great streaming device for movies, TV and music

Name: Mr. L. J. Clough
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 November 2020
Review Content: Faulty on arrival. Was stuck in update mode. Took ages to get customer support to understand that it had been trying to update for longer than it takes for any other of my previous devices. Still waiting for it to be picked up

Name: Tractor
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 November 2020
Review Content: Fairly easy to use. Good picture for 1080 HD. Sound good through an AVR. Prime video is marred by they own ads. Basic remote but works fine. Recommend getting OTG cable to easy expand internal app storage or removable external storage.

Name: Daryn Murphy
Review Title: Slightly different to original version but nothing to stop you buying it.

Review Content: Basically the same as the original version, slightly different lay out to the original version, a little confusing if you are used to the original but same content and video quality. Doesn't control the volume of the television though.

Name: cavywavy
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 November 2020
Review Content: Brought this to use in my motorhome and have been very pleased. Was amazed to find netflix and bbciplayer on here to just needs skygo and I could use it for everything.Only down side it uses a lot of data and ic not found a cheap 4g sim to go with it yet

Name: E.G.
Review Title: Good update to an older Firestick, for someone not very tech minded at least
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 December 2020
Review Content: Bought to replace a much earlier version Firestick which had become super slow and glitchy, and wish I had done so sooner - this is much more responsive, everything works faster and smoother. I'm not particularly tecchie, and had no idea what a difference a new one could make!

Name: Tony Miller
Review Title: Major improvement on the 'old' Fire TV stick
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2020
Review Content: We have been using the previous version of the Fire TV Stick for sometime now.  Our main complaint was the poor speed of response, and the time taken to startup certain apps like BBC iPlayer.  The Fire TV Stick Lite was a revelation. So much faster.  I would thoroughly recommend upgrading to this new version.  Well worth the money.

Name: chas
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2021
Review Content: Always a little dubious about new fangled (to me, at least) gadgets and have little understanding of wifi or connecting different devices but this was literally pug it in and off you go. The picture is actually better than via the aerial. There looks to be plenty to access but iPlayer and Amazon Prime will keep me entertained. I still find myself navigating with the handset when a spoken command will get me where i want to be thanks to Alexa. A piece magic for £30.

Name: Jekera
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 December 2020
Review Content: Perfect for 1080 use. I have the original firestick, one with tv control  and now a light version. Although the volume control is useful, not sure if its worth the extra money. You still need you TV remote to select the correct hdmi port for the firestick, so you will probably have that to hand to adjust volume levels.

Name: B.L.
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 February 2021
Review Content: Love this product, cannot believe it took me so long to buy one. Fast, great image quality, I have all my accounts easily accessible....really like it. Not a great fan of voice recognition or Alexa’s functionality so will not comment

Name: gordie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 December 2020
Review Content: Appears to work fine for what I need but I did send back the first one I bought because Amazon then decided to discount it by 40% and they couldn’t give me a discount so it was more profitable for me to send it back and then re-buy it !How stupid is that ?

Name: EDWARD HODGSON
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2020
Review Content: What can I say other than its brilliant, my only regret is that I didn't subscribe sooner. Its passed many a lonely time for me in these extraordinary times. Fantastic films to suit every taste without the tedium of adverts. Would recommend, very good value for money.

Name: Midge
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 December 2020
Review Content: Bought this on a recommendation and haven't been disappointed.  It's opened up a whole new experience for me and just love all the options.  Setting up was really easy and having the option to use Alexa has also been very positive.

Name: LondonClive
Review Title: Does what it says it will do
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 January 2021
Review Content: Purchased the Fire TV Stick Lite mainly to get access to online demand TV as an alternative to Freeview channels. Haven't used it's full potential yet, but the first time I asked it to play something, the reaction was really quick. Netflix series and online films play (almost) with no problem, even with mobile broadband.

Name: Mr I.
Review Title: Mostly OK, but shame about the sound quality.....
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 February 2021
Review Content: I bought this fire TV stick to replace an older version (from approx 3 years ago) which I moved to a TV in my bedoom. Setup of the new stick went fine and the newer user interface works well after a few minutes acclimatisation. The big disappointment is the sound quality - it's nowhere near as good as that offered by the earlier version of the stick.  The sound has lost a lot of dynamic range and clarity (when using the same fairly powerful amp and decent, floor standing speakers). So much so, that I've re-instated the old stick and now use the new one with the bedroom TV!

Name: Sonja Greville-Seyes
Review Title: Don’t attempt if you value your mental health

Name: Mr Norman P Doodson

Review Content: I reported this to customer service and an extremely helpful representative talked me through how to set it back to factory settings and one of the annoying things has been put right, ie it would start a programme again from the beginning after the first set of adverts.s. Streaming quality is good and it is quick to change streaming services.

Name: Fitpro

Review Content: This was bought to replace a broken fire stick.  I should have got another with tv controls - it is a bit annoying to always have to reach for the tv remote control; fuse economy!  It's a cheaper option than buying a new smart tv.

Name: Gemma hill
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 February 2021
Review Content: Great way to watch TV. As a prime member , it was a no brainier really. Good selection of things to watch, that aren’t on Netflix and other streaming services. Lots of football highlights and things I haven’t seen anywhere else. Have recommended to lots of friends.

Name: Kerry
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 December 2020
Review Content: I've been meaning to get one of these for ages but to be honest, I'm not great with technology & thought it would be difficult to set up. Name: rahrah123

Name: Ojarm

It could be my imagination, but I definitely think the picture quality is superior. I would recommend this product without hesitation.

Name: Mr. M. J. Lincoln

Name: Toni

Name: Mrs. A. L. Barnes

Name: J. A. Waller
Review Title: Faster than the old Fire Stick

Name: Pat Jackson
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 March 2021
Review Content: Third one that I've bought over the years, always work well and a really good extra to have on your t.v..Always good value and effective, with little or no buffering. I use one in my motorhome, streaming through my phone.

Name: Claire
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 February 2021

Name: Karis
Review Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 December 2020

Name: Sue Williams

Name: Farmers wife

Name: Amazon Customer
